name: The Death of Death 🌱♾️ (A Talk + Discussion by Singularity University Founding Faculty José Cordeiro)
description:
We're lucky that Singularity University Founding Faculty José Cordeiro is here with us at Zuzalu!

He has graciously offered to host a discussion about "The Death of Death"—the International bestseller published in over 10 languages around the world.

Come to this immortal discussion if you want to live, forever. Stay away if you want to die.

Only for Immortalists, Deathists not welcome🖖🖖🖖
